author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The new biopic Christy following former professional boxer Christy Martin has flopped at the box office. It’s become a popular topic of discussion regarding why exactly the film has failed, and Ruby Rose is pointing her finger at star Sydney Sweeney for the movie’s underperformance. Rose shared her thoughts on Threads to criticize the final [...]

The post Ruby Rose Slams Sydney Sweeney Over ‘Christy’ Movie appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Ruby Rose Slams Sydney Sweeney Over ‘Christy’ Movie

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The animated series South Park recently debuted its twenty-seventh season, and with it came an all-new wave of controversy, as the season has spent much of its focus on current United States president Donald Trump. Now South Park creators Matt Stone and Trey Parker have explained their decision to focus so much on Trump. Obviously [...]

The post ‘South Park’ Creators Explain Recent Focus On Donald Trump appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘South Park’ Creators Explain Recent Focus On Donald Trump

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The upcoming movie Avengers: Doomsday is set to be another major MCU crossover event. As these movies have proven, however, they’re not always movies where the heroes win. In fact, quite a few characters have been killed off in the Avengers series, and it looks like another fan-favorite Marvel character might be killed off in [...]

The post ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ May Kill Off Fan-Favorite MCU Character appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ May Kill Off Fan-Favorite MCU Character
